```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
# Install required packages
# install.packages("ggplot2")
# install.packages("charlatan")

# Load required libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(charlatan)
library(gridExtra)
# Set the seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

# Generate fake data using charlatan
fake_data <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 1),
  y = rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 1)
)

# Plot 1
plot1 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Plot 1")

# Plot 2
plot2 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Plot 2")

# Plot 3
plot3 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(title = "Plot 3")

# Plot 4
plot4 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Plot 4")

# Plot 5
plot5 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_density_2d() +
  labs(title = "Plot 5")

# Plot 6
plot6 <- ggplot(fake_data, aes(x = x)) +
  geom_histogram() + 
  labs(title = "Plot 6")
```

```{r}
# Arrange and display the plots
grid.arrange(plot1, plot2, plot3, plot4, plot5, plot6, ncol = 2)

```
